text:
On the JMeter download page (http://jakarta.apache.org/site/downloads/downloads_jmeter.cgi)
there is the command "you MUST verify the integrity of the downloaded files ..." but there are no instructions on howto do that.
The sentence itself could be made into a link to the instructions that are on the main Apache page
http://httpd.apache.org/download.cgi

Regards
BB
creator: billbruns@yahoo.com

text:
Thanks for the report.

Fixed for all the Jakarta download pages.

Will appear in the next few hours.
creator: sebb@apache.org
